page.title: 06The Common
page.content: One of Studham's main attractions is its large common. It is a mixture of grassy areas, gorse and hawthorn thickets and scattered trees intersected by many footpaths. The common is popular for picnics, short walks, horse riding and village events. Simon(Age 7) You can play hide and seek and football. Last year we had a mini marathon. Nicholas (Age 6) There is a May Fair every year and a bonfire on Guy Fawkes night. Danielle (Age 6) The common has lots of nature and plants. Many people visit Studham to enjoy its open common and an added attraction is the close proximity of Whipsnade Zoo and Dunstable Downs.
